game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Embark on an epic journey to find the lost artifact that holds immense power.
game.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the ancient temple hidden deep in the jungle.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a rare magical item

tasks.description: Gather information from the villagers about the temple's location.
tasks.objective: Speak to 3 villagers and gather information

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous jungle to reach the entrance of the temple.
tasks.objective: Find a safe path through the dense jungle

tasks.description: Solve the puzzles and traps inside the temple to reach the artifact's chamber.
tasks.objective: Solve 3 different puzzles and avoid the traps

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian protecting the artifact and claim your prize.
tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the artifact
